featured.text: In Asia, Western names were used until 2000 when the committee decided to use Asian names to 35 Asians’ awareness of typhoons.
What is the main idea of the passage? (A) Asians have used soybean produce for thousands of years.

definition.zh_def: 亞洲人，指來自亞洲地區的人，通常包括東亞、東南亞和南亞的民族。
definition.en_def: People originating from the continent of Asia, typically including ethnic groups from East Asia, Southeast Asia, and South Asia.
definition.example: Many Asians celebrate the Lunar New Year with family gatherings and traditional foods.
